job description:
Description:
The type of professional manager looking to onboard would preferably have IT professional contracting & resource management experience, a light PM or project coordinator background with a strong data foundation . Manager think we can reset the skill set of this position with the contracting firms, moving away from a standard

Professional/Technical skill set:
Required:
Project financials Building and maintaining project budgets & forecasting based on deliverables and resource needs
Business Data professional collecting, organizing, maintaining data, data analytic and reporting
Experienced with IT professional capacity planning
Application/software: Mid-level experience with Tableau, Expert with Microsoft suite Visio, PowerPoint, Excel, Access, MS Projects and CRM experience a plus

Preferred:
IT Vendor contracting experience - knowledge of different types of professional contracting, ranging from staff augmentation, project based SOWs and managed services from the vendors perspective
Experience with IT Vendor management systems and/or HR Workforce applications
Experience with Professional Services Automation software
ERP Financial system(s) - exposure with hands-on experience preferred.
